verbose_text: ELISA analysis from collected media showed that LPS stimulation increased both IL-8 and TNFalpha cytokine secretion and 1muM Abeta 1-40 increased IL-6 cytokine secretion by the Caco-2 cells (XREF_FIG).
evidence: LPS stimulation increased both IL-8 and TNFalpha cytokine secretion and 1muM Abeta 1-40 increased IL-6
